body.bibl: Monferrer-Sala, Juan Pedro. “‘New Skin for Old Stories’: Queens Zenobia and Māwiya, and Christian Arab Groups in the Eastern Frontier during the 3rd–4th Centuries CE.” In Mapping Knowledge: Cross-Pollination in Late Antiquity and the Middle Ages, edited by Charles Burnett and Pedro Mantas-España, 71–98. Series Arabica Veritas 1. Cordoba: CNERU / The Warburg Institute / Oriens Academic, 2014.
